caption.p: Photomicrograph of Alloxan treated diabetic control ( A) compared with normal control ( B), and glibenclamide treated ( C). ( A) Arrow indicates the Alloxan induced damage of islets of Langerhans. ( B) Arrow indicates healthy islets of Langerhans. ( C) Arrow indicates glibenclamide restoration of cellular population size of islets of Langerhans. Stained with haematoxylin and eosin, Magnification 100x.
